about_the_game:
Synopsis:

Join the Eternal Church as a loyal Faceless and earn your own identity by delving into the Descent, a source of unspeakable holy power. Face the Pantheon, a group of formidable demigods who have made residence in the Descent. Lucky for you; you have the support of the powerful Eternal Church and the Descent has blessed you with the greatest gift of all, the power to...

Become Godlike:

Blessed with the power to hear the Descent's whispers, you will be able to find totems throughout your journey, allowing you to learn and use build-defining abilities.

OR

Find the dens of other demigods and take them down and steal some of their power.

Death is not the End:

As a demigod, death affects you differently now, Faceless. Normal mortal enemies can never truly kill a demigod, so falling to a normal enemy offers little consequences. BUT, once you step into an arena with a fellow demigod, death is something to be feared.

Dying to a demigod will cause you to truly die, losing all of your gear and most of your abilities, but fret not, the Eternal Church as plenty of other Faceless to send back down.

The Descent Remembers:

Even though you will fall in battle, the path you carved through the Descent will remain. Locations of bosses and ability totems will remain where they were last, allowing for you to quickly return to them and try again.

 

Carve your way through the Pantheon, open the Gates of Hell, and earn unimaginable powers for Eternal Church, Faceless. We are counting on you.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be pixelated violence and gore. Characters will do cruel things to others. There will be cultists who will do gruesome rituals. Dialogue will make references to things like this.

name: Eternal Descent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: Something that can run pixel graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Descend to the gates of Hell and earn powers befitting a God. Delve into the Descent, explore procedurally generated caves to find and fight powerful demigods. Build a base and attract helpful NPCs to aid you in your quest. Die and retry in this unique combination of survival and roguelike.
